contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of November, 2011, it is hereby ordered that the Petition for Review is denied.
The Application to File Under Seal is granted. The Motion to Strike Pennsylvania Gaming Control Board’s Reply Brief or in the Alternative Permit OAG to File Sur-Reply Brief is denied.
Chief Justice CASTILLE files a Dissenting Statement.
Justice EAKIN Files a Dissenting Statement which is joined by Justice McCAFFERY.
